mjc.symbol

Class VariableInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • mjc.symbol.VariableInfo

  • public class VariableInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    VariableInfo represents information about a declared variable.

      • getBlock

        public int getBlock()
        Returns the block within the method in which a local variable is declared, or -1 if the variable is a field or parameter.

        Returns:
        Block of the local variable, or -1 if it is a field or parameter.

      • setBlock

        public void setBlock(int block)
        Sets the block within the method in which a local variable is declared.

        Note: This should really only be called by MethodInfo.addLocal(VariableInfo).

        Parameters:
        block - The block in which the local variable is declared.
